location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PLAN TO ACCOMPANY THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF BAHRAIN AND CABLE AND WIRELESS LIMITED.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: A pencil number enclosed in a circle is located in the top right hand corner of the recto of the folio.Materials: 1 blue tracing sheetDimensions: 475mm x 390mm

mods.abstract: Revised plan showing the area of land purchased by Cable and Wireless Limited and the protected area surrounding it to be leased by the company. The boundaries of both the protected area and land being purchased are marked with a single red line. The plan was revised as the north and eastern boundaries of the protected area differed from the initial plan drawn up in December 1935.Prepared in the Land Department, Bahrain.
